sources.title: I'll Be Home For Christmas | Full Movie | Jack Palance | Robert Hays | Happy Holidays
sources.description:
I'll Be Home For Christmas - A mayor of a small town is desperate to find a doctor to keep open the town's clinic. When a surgeon visits for the Christmas holiday, their history as high school sweethearts and challenges in his big city hospital position causes complications.
1997.  Stars: Ann Jillian, Robert Hays, Ashley Gorrell, Jack Palance

metadata.Plot: A college student experiences difficulty in getting home for Christmas after being hazed by his friends. While struggling to get home in time for Christmas, he learns quite a bit about himself and the true meaning of the holiday.
metadata.Writer: Tom Nursall, Harris Goldberg, Michael Allin
metadata.Actors: Jonathan Taylor Thomas, Jessica Biel, Adam LaVorgna
